img_above_text:
## Where to Find Captain Void-Illusion
You can find Captain Void-Illusion along the Road of Longevity in the Valley of Ecstasy. From the Shrine, head directly right and up the small hill past a large inacessible tower. You'll find a large corpse of some kind at the base of a statue built into the cliffs ahead.
img_below_text: This is actually one of the four Captains that the Pagoda Realm Prisoner spoke of, but it looks like someone beat you to putting this captain out of their misery. You can still interact with the body to claim the Spirit of Captain Void-Illusion. And hey, since they still count as a Yaoguai Chief in the journal, that's one less boss to worry about!

img_summary: The image depicts a snowy environment where a player character approaches a large, decayed corpse near a statue embedded in a cliffside. This scene aligns with the guide's description of finding Captain Void-Illusion's remains along the Road of Longevity in the Valley of Ecstasy. The setting emphasizes the discovery of the captain's body, which players can interact with to claim the Spirit of Captain Void-Illusion.
